Name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
Title: Remnant Squall: Consecrated Flying Serpent
Desc: A flying serpent that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. Now, it commands the fearsome winds.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Consecrated Flying Serpent

25033.Name: Scattershot Vortex
25033.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. $[K56] all <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124051]</color> cards in your Hand. Double the DMG dealt once for every 2 cards you $[K56].

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.

C124051.Name: Bonecruncher's Energy Block
C124051.Desc: Randomly $[K56] 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Cost and create 1 Elemental Die of your active character's Element. (Only 1 such card can be played per Round)

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.

25034.Name: Immortal Remnants: Anemo
25034.Desc: (Passive) When battle begins, create 6 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124051]</color> and place them evenly into your deck.
